sense.def:
Northward
ali
northwards
pomeni proti severu.

seg.quote: They had fled northwards towards Kurnal.
Children were put on ponies and sent racing northward.

sense.def:
Kot
northward
opisujemo stvari, ki se premikajo proti severu ali so obrnjene proti severu.

seg.quote: ...the northward drift of the massive Himalayan chain.
